extendedInfo.description: NOTICE - This is the older, original version of Big Buttons Keyboard, now called Big Buttons Keyboard ORIGINAL and is meant only for older phones that can not be upgraded beyond Android 1.5.A newer, free version is recommended for newer Android phones (Firmware 1.6 and up) called Big Buttons Keyboard STANDARD. Please look-up & download this newer version from the Android Market.Finally, a more powerful version of Big Buttons is available on the Android Market - Big Buttons Keyboard DELUXE ($2.99) includes word prediction, error correction, voice-to-text microphone, large cursor keys & more.Attention: mobile developers, manufacturers, integrators - don't force your customers to use an impossibly small QWERTY keyboard. Instead, give them a proven, superior mobile keyboard - designed for humans. Delta II can be licensed for use in smartphones, TV remotes, portable medical equipment, automobiles, aircraft, smartwatches, etc. Delta II is compatible with touch screens, hard button keyboards, next word predictors, swiping, stylus, etc.Delta II is the only alternative keyboard layout that makes sense for modern handheld devices.Contact:  busdev@chicagologic.com      US Patent 7,658,562IMPORTANT - Big Buttons will NOT work until it is installed - it is critical that you do BOTH installation steps. Press the blue & white BB icon to see instructions.Big Buttons Keyboard Original:Patented Delta II modified-QWERTY keyboard matrix is EXTREMELY fast to learn!!Big Buttons Keyboard also has bigger number & punctuation buttons, making EVERYTHING you type on your smartphone EASIER!Note: If any download from the Android Market hangs, go to your: Settings > Applications > Manage Applications > Market:  Then Clear data and Clear cache. Then try to download again. Also, when installing ANY keyboard, you will receive a scary warning: "Attention - This input method may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers..."Don't worry. Big Buttons Keyboard does not collect any of your information - check our permissions. We only access the phones vibrator for key-press feedback. Big Buttons Keyboard does NOT access things like the internet, your email, text messages, etc.Big Buttons Keyboard sole purpose is to function as a keyboard.Welcome to hassle-free typing with Big Buttons Keyboard!About the Delta II tm Keyboard Matrix:

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: We do not get mic option here...this was the most simple way of writing only by speaking... also it does not give related keywords on the top.... its so annoying and dissapointing....plz update it as early as possible
reviews.author: ashwin sharma

reviews.title: Excellent, probably the best keyboard
reviews.comment: what else is there to say?  one problem, on my htc One S running ics, it\'s not possible to type an uppercase letter T or G or L, you\'ll get lowercase. that\'s rather weird, and the suggested free version for later android versions is incompatible with this device, so i\'m stuck with this version. also, the installation guide states that the 2-step process to activate it may not be enough and that you may have to reboot, which is indeed the case (take note in case you think it doesn\'t work with your device) and still after that you might have to pick the input method from the status panel after the 1st boot. regardless, those are very minor annoyances compared with constantly hitting the wrong keys in the htc sense input panel. if you have problems with the small standard keyboards try this one, you\'ll be glad you did.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App.!
reviews.comment: This Is amazing helps me Type faster.!
reviews.author: Marissa Diaz

reviews.comment: Thank the app Gods!!! Im back!!!! Must of had a Bad dream? I was stuck using the new BB app an couldn\'t find my dearly loved Original BB! The HORROR!

reviews.comment: so much easier to use then the standard keyboard. I can acutally text now. Saved me from buying a new phone.

reviews.title: For big fingers
reviews.comment: Very cool keyboard, love it. the only thing is that the capital letters don\'t work with some of the letters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: lifesaver
reviews.comment: A couple of glitches. Won\'t capitalize t, g, or l...space bar is kind of small...type a lot of \"n\'s\" instead of spaces. Otherwise...it\'s amazing. Keys on Big Buttons Original are significantly larger than on the newer version. I only use this product vertically. No real advantage using BB horizontally, but vertically...especially, with a smallish 3.5\" display and large hands...what can I say to the devs, but thank you for an outstanding product.
